name: TownLinked
description:
Take care of a small town with only a 1 way bridge to the outside world!

Anyone who goes off to work, doesn't come back, because they cant.

Don't worry the houses are air dropped with people already inside of them. ;)

HOW TO PLAY

1) Building

To build, simply click on the building you wish to build at the bottom of your screen.

You can now drag your mouse around and a preview of your building will be shown  when you want to place your building down (making sure it is coloured green) click  again and your building should appear where you clicked.

2) Moving camera

W A S D - can be used to move the camera

Scroll wheel - can be used to zoom in and out 

3) Sending workers

Press the green button in the top right of your screen to open the menu for sending  workers (this can only be done once per day) and type out the number of workers you wish to send (max. 999). This sends workers off across the bridge and will earn    you money the next day (however they wont come back and their houses will    remain)

4) Ending days

Press the red button in the top right of your screen to skip to the next day, you will  receive money from factories and workers each time you do this, however beware of  the activists who will tear down factories every 3 days.

BUILDINGS

1) Small house

  COST: 5 Coins

  HOUSES: 10 People

2) Large House

 COST: 20 Coins

  HOUSES: 50 People

3) Factory

  COST: 20 Coins

  PRODUCES: 15 Coins per day

OH YEAH AND I ADDED A BOAT IT COSTS 50 COINS AND MOVES AROUND AT THE TOP OF THE ISLAND!! Have Fun! (made with gdevelop ❤)
